introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: These Terms and Conditions govern your use of Menio's restaurant website creation service and constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Menio.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.content: Menio provides a SAAS platform that allows restaurant owners to create and maintain an online presence through a personalized website for their restaurant.

subscription.title: 3. Subscription
subscription.pricing: 3.1 Pricing: The service is priced at 30 euros per month after a free 30-day trial period.
subscription.freeTrial: 3.2 Free Trial: Upon signing up, you are eligible for a 30-day free trial. A valid credit card is required to begin the free trial. Your card will not be charged during the trial period.
subscription.billing: 3.3 Billing: After the free trial period ends, your credit card will be automatically charged the monthly subscription fee unless you cancel before the trial ends. If you do not provide a valid payment method, your trial will automatically expire after 30 days.

userObligations.title: 4. User Obligations
userObligations.accurateInfo: 4.1 Accurate Information: You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process and to update such information to keep it accurate, current, and complete.
userObligations.contentResponsibility: 4.2 Content Responsibility: You are solely responsible for the content you publish through our service. This includes menu information, photographs, restaurant descriptions, and any other content.

termination.title: 5. Termination
termination.cancel: 5.1 You may cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings or by contacting customer support.
termination.deactivation: 5.2 Upon termination, your website will remain accessible until the end of your paid period, after which it will be deactivated.

privacy.title: 6. Privacy
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and disclose information about you.

changesTerms.title: 7. Changes to Terms
changesTerms.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will provide notice of significant changes through our website or by sending you an email.

contactInfo.title: 8. Contact Information
contactInfo.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at thomas@menio.app.
